attributes.review: i asked mr trump where he had gotten his new hair extensions from and he just murmured something under his breath and pointed to a very suspicious building. 0/10 , i came out with orange skin and nappy blonde hair , my hair line looks like it FADING now !!! 😡 do NOT recommend this app !! i’ll save you some time and tell you now 👁👄👁
attributes.title: horrible horrible!!!!👩🏽‍🦯👑

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and thought that it would be such a great way to support my president but it asked for access to my phone number and i was suddenly getting spammed with bots but i was also tracked! It made my phone glitch so bad i couldnt even use it and had to get a new one!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!

attributes.review: I’m writing this app review to let you know that this is the opposite of a genius app I truly thought it was gonna be a well working oiled machine but it’s the opposite it’s like I thought our president was a jenius but for some reason it’s like he wanted to fail at this
attributes.title: Terrible quality it’s all fake news💯

attributes.review: when i first downloaded this app, i was genuinely looking for a resource but it ended up leaking my personal information. i got multiple emails on attempted logins for my email and apple id. what the hell is this app?? DO NOT DOWNLOAD IT. and if u can, spread the word that this app can be harmful!!
attributes.title: if i could, i would give this app 0 stars

attributes.review: Woo Chile the ghetto..the ghetto. And it had a white refrigerator. This app is completely awful as a person who sUPorTs TRumP I think this app needs to be taken down now. Like I’m all for I hate people of color but I am just gonna hide it behind saying All lives matter, and Trump 2020 but this app isn’t it.
attributes.title: Just awful

attributes.review: This app caused me much more stress than I had intended! Caused my phone to be extremely glitchy and killed my battery instantly when I opened it! I started receiving texts every 5 minutes encouraging me to donate more and more. DISAPPOINTED TO SAY THE LEAST. Its honestly changed my opinion of Mr. Trump. DESPICABLE APP. Should be removed.
attributes.title: Boomer Trump Supporter Left Dissapointed!

attributes.review: As soon as i opened the app an ear aching screeching noise came from it causing my dogs to go absolutely haywire. One of them stepped on my foot which cause me to fall and hit my head on the corner of the counter giving me a concussion and putting me in a 4 year coma. Will be deleting and never using again. 😠😠
attributes.title: terrible and disgusting😡😡

attributes.review: As a trump supporter 😀 it makes me sad 😢 to say that this app is harassment! It must be run by antifa!!!! 😧 I got spammed through my phone number. SPAMMED!! Our gracious leader trump would NEVER do that to such an important fan! 😔 It MUST be antifa because they do everything and are fascist!!! From a trump supporter to other trump supporters, don’t get THIS APP. It’s harassment and may be considered FAKE NEWS TOO!!! 🧚🏻😌✨❤️
attributes.title: HARASSMENT AND ANTIFA

attributes.review: This app is the worst app in the whole App Store. Do not waste your precious phone storage with it !! Unless you enjoy denouncing fundamental human rights, support a re-election of fascism, are blind to the victimization of capitalism, are cool with giving up the 1st amendment, are brainwashed under a state founded on systematic racism and prejudice.....then be my guest ur gonna love it
attributes.title: Not worth your time !!!
